title: Developing Scientific Argumentation Skills Through Inquiry-Based Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and social phenomena, with online learning tool experience
context.additional_context: A process enhancing scientific argumentation skills through inquiry-based activities on social issues using virtual labs and LMS, incorporating project-based assessment and peer-review systems.

learning_goals: Learners can present a clear claim about social issues and construct arguments combining relevant evidence
Learners can logically explain reasoning processes by analyzing virtual laboratory data
Learners can present critical counterarguments against peers' arguments and develop rebuttal strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
